answers.answer: Hi Charmaine!  I wish you success in finding what you are looking for!  Good luck to you!

I'm another volunteer here ...Because no one is allowed to post personally identifying information on this forum, I recommend that you seek out the help from our sister initiative Online Diabetes Support Team (ODST) -- also sponsored by JDRF.  You'll find links to them on the main JDRF website www.jdrf.orgWorking with the volunteers there, you may be connected with folks who either are knowledgeable about programs to help underwrite the costs, or perhaps folks who have an extra or an unwanted remote.  Some of the same folks volunteer here, so I know it's a great group of very effective folks.Our forum is intended for general sharing where information can be broadly used. ODST is a much more 1:1 type of interaction that starts over a secure website and can grow, depending on the interests/needs of the folks asking for help & information.Good luck to you & your daughter.
